article: The great ship, the Titanic, sailed for New York from England on April 12th, 1912. The ship had sixteen watertight compartments . Even if two of them were broken, she would  _  be able to stay on the water. Four days after  _  , while the Titanic was sailing  _  the icy waters of the North Atlantic, a huge ice mountain suddenly appeared. The great ship turned hard. The Titanic turned just in time, and just missed the big  _  of ice beside her. Suddenly there was a trembling  _  from below and the captain went down to see what had  _  . The noise had been so weak that  _  thought the ship had been broken. But the captain  _  that the ship was sinking very quickly, for five of the sixteen watertight compartments had already been broken! The order to  _  the ship was given and hundreds of people jumped into the icy water. As there were not enough lifeboats for everybody, 1,500 lives were  _  . Although the sad story has been so many years, people still remember it clearly.
